entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 6 May 2023
